description: This file is the entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports necessary React modules, CSS styles, and the root App component, then renders the App component inside a React StrictMode wrapper into the DOM element with id 'root'.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React element into the DOM root.
